thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Benefitfocus reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.44

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Benefitfocus reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.44
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Benefitfocus Inc:
* BENEFITFOCUS ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.26
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.44 * Q1 REVENUE $62.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $58.5 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.54 TO $0.79
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.38 TO $0.44
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $55.5 MILLION TO $57.5 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.39 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.18, REVENUE VIEW $60.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.65, REVENUE VIEW $254.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
Our
